sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>flowers</radical> <radical>net</radical> is upon your <radical>forehead</radical> in the <radical>evening</radical>. These appear on your head at night whenever you are having a <kanji>dream</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Watch yourself sleeping. Then, a net of flowers appear on your forehead as you start to dream.
readingMnemonic: You <kanji>dream</kanji> about cows saying "<reading>moo</reading> (<ja>む</ja>), moo, moo!"
readingInfo: While still dreaming, you say "moo" out loud too. "Moooo!"
